  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes the controller class.

    • handleSearchClientButtonClick

      public void handleSearchClientButtonClick(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Handles the event when the "Search Client" button is clicked. Retrieves materials without a contract for the given client ID and displays them in the TableView.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - The action event.

    • handleCreateContract

      public void handleCreateContract(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Handles the event when the "Create Contract" button is clicked. Creates a contract for the selected materials and client ID, and updates the database accordingly.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - The action event.

    • refreshTableData

      public void refreshTableData()
      Refreshes the data displayed in the TableView based on the client ID.
